topComments.author: shakti anand
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Est√° a uma altitude de aproximadamente 16.000 p√©s. D√°-lhe uma vista panor√¢mica das montanhas cobertas de neve. Baralacha LA passa basicamente conectando o distrito de lauhal com leh na faixa de zanskar. A BRO construiu belas estradas para conectar os lugares, embora em alguns trechos a estrada esteja em constru√ß√£o. Voc√™ pode encontrar lugares de descanso no bar zing zing para fazer uma pequena pausa. Voc√™ tamb√©m pode ir a Deepak tal e Suraj tal enrout para clicar em fotos. Aconselh√°vel que as pessoas com asma tomem todas as precau√ß√µes, pois a altitude elevada causa falta de ar a todos. Mantenha-se hidratado e coma de forma saud√°vel em intervalos regulares para manter o n√≠vel de energia.  (Original) It is on an altitude of approx 16000 ft. Gives you a panoramic view of snow covered mountains. Baralacha LA pass is basically connecting lauhal district with leh in zanskar range. BRO has constructed beautiful roads to connect the places although at some patches the road is under construction. You can find resting places at zing zing bar to take a short break . You can also hault at Deepak tal and Suraj tal enrout to click pictures. Advisable for people with asthma to take all the precautions as high altitude causes breathlessness to everyone.keep urself hydrated and eat healthy at regular intervals to maintain the energy level.

topComments.author: Gagan Gill
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Baralacha La, mais conhecida como passagem de Baralacha, est√° situada na cordilheira de Zanskar. √â uma passagem de alta montanha localizada ao longo da rodovia Leh-Manali. As paisagens est√©reis sem quaisquer obstru√ß√µes de lojas ou hot√©is aqui parecem verdadeiramente bonitas para os espectadores.  (Original) Baralacha La, better known as Baralacha pass is situated in the Zanskar range. It is a high mountain pass located along the Leh-Manali highway. The barren sceneries without any obstructions of shops or hotels here look truly beautiful to the onlookers.

topComments.author: Sudhanshu Jaitly
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) A 146 Km de Manali. A viagem √© cansativa, cansativa e em alguns pontos arriscada. Voc√™ n√£o receber√° sinal de celular a partir de keylong. Isso significa que, se ocorrer uma avaria do ve√≠culo, voc√™ estar√° a pelo menos 2 horas de dist√¢ncia de qualquer ajuda. N√£o h√° banheiros no caminho ou na passagem. Leve comida com voc√™, pois n√£o h√° op√ß√£o de comida e √°gua aqui. Por causa da defici√™ncia de oxig√™nio, nunca pense em fazer um pouco de esfor√ßo. Mantenha alguns medicamentos como para dor de cabe√ßa com voc√™.  A natureza est√° no seu melhor. Lindo.  (Original) 146 Km away from Manali. The journey is tiring,taxing and at some points risky. You will not get mobile signal from keylong onwards . That means if breakdown of vehicle happens  you are at least 2 hours away from any help. No washrooms either in way or at pass. Take food with you as there is no option of food and water here. Because of deficiency of oxygen , don't ever think of even a bit of exertion. Keep few medications like for headache with you.  Nature is at its best . Beautiful.

topComments.author: Sangram Mane
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √â um lugar bonito. A viagem de Manali a Baralacha la pass √© √≥tima. Visitamos o local na primeira semana de junho. A paisagem e a estrada s√£o coisas que s√≥ v√≠amos em filmes. √â uma longa viagem, mas certamente vale a pena. Se voc√™ estiver viajando de Manali, deve sair mais cedo. O lado positivo √© que √© muito menos lotado do que o famoso Rohtang Pass. H√° apenas pequenos dhabas para comer antes da passagem. Algumas pessoas podem sentir um pouco de desconforto na respira√ß√£o, pois s√£o aproximadamente 13.500 p√©s. Mas n√£o √© grave. O lugar √© uma √≥tima visita.  (Original) It's a beautiful place. The journey from Manali to Baralacha la pass is great. We visited the place in the first week of June. The scenery and the road are something we had seen only in movies. It's a long drive but surely worth it. If you're traveling from Manali then you should leave early. The plus side is it's much less crowded than the famous Rohtang pass. There are only small dhabas to eat before the pass. Some people may find a little discomfort in breathing as it's approx 13500 ft. But it's not serious. The place is a great visit.

topComments.author: raj kumar baggan
topComments.comment: Beautiful and Easy Track, waterfalls, Lakes on the way Keylong to Baralacha pass

topComments.author: Gyan Deo Singh
topComments.comment: Baralacha also known as¬†Baralacha La Pass, at 4,850¬†m or 16050¬†ft¬†is a high¬†mountain pass¬†in¬†Zanskar range,¬†connecting¬†Lahaul¬†district in¬†Himachal Pradesh¬†to¬†Leh district¬†in¬†Ladakh. The Leh‚ÄìManali Highway traverses the pass. The two headwaters of the Chenab River, Chandra and Bhaga, originate near the Baralacha Pass. The Bhaga river originates from Surya taal lake, which is situated a few of kilometers from the pass towards Manali. The Chandra originates from glacier in this region. The native name of Chenab, "Chandrabhaga", represents the union of Chandra and Bhaga rivers downstream. Cross roads from Spiti, Ladakh, Zanskar and Lahaul meet at the Baralacha Pass. In ancient times it was part of a trade route. On the northwest originates the Bhaga River while the Chandra flows south-east. Below the Baralacha-la is an emerald lake, the Suraj tal (Sun lake), the source of the river Bhaga.

topComments.author: shashank agwan
topComments.comment: Awesome , can't explain in words. Better than Rohatang pass enjoyed snow at May. It's 1000 feet higher than Rohatang.

topComments.author: Saurabh Chawla
topComments.comment: We halted at Jispa to go to Baralacha La.... And Journey to this place is mesmerizing with what a scenic beauty once in a lifetime one should travel this place but please be prepared because the altitude is around 5000 mtrs with thin air pressure and low oxygen... two lakes are also there one is deepak tal at little lower altitude and one is suraj tal which is baralacha La starting point of two rivers one is bhaga and chandra they both become chenab

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Baralacha √© a passagem de alta montanha na cordilheira de Zanskar, conectando o distrito de Lahaul em Himachal Pradesh ao distrito de Leh em Ladakh. topComments.comment: Quite difficult to reach...not much snow this time...  Back in 2015 there were walls of snow on both sides of the road...  Times have changed and surely Global warming is having visible Affect now...
